name: Hedge (Tito Guidotti)
description:
You objective is to fill 90% of the area before the timer ends, without the enemies hitting your new wall. 

You aways start at the top-left corner. Control with WASD or arrow keys, and be aware that, when in open areas, you cant control  your character, he just goes forward!

Submission for the nokia jam 4.  Be sure to check the other games and vote!
